text: Rabbi Nahum Eliezer Rabinovitch (; 1928 â€“ May 6, 2020) was a Canadian-born Israeli Orthodox rabbi and posek. He was the head of Yeshivat Birkat Moshe in Ma'ale Adumim. He was born in Montreal, Canada. In 2015 he led the Giyur K'halacha conversion court, of which he was one of the founders. Rabinovitch died on May 6, 2020 at the age of 92.Dean of Maale Adumim yeshiva, Rabbi Nahum Rabinovitch passes away at age 92 ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Israeli rabbis Category:People from Montreal
title: Nahum Rabinovitch
